summary: A young boy from a working-class family and a bored young girl from a rich family are falling in love. Soon, she's pregnant and the teenagers have to escape from their disapproving parents.
cast: Jaycee Chan|Fiona Sit|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Eric Tsang|Teresa Mo|On-On Yu|Hin-Wai Au|Min-Leung Chan|Yiu-Fai Cheung|David Chiang|Kar Lok Chin|Raymond Cho|Henry Fong|Shiu Hung Hui|Chi-Bok Lam|Suet Lam|Chi Ming Lee|Tak-Wing Lee|Jamie Luk|Wai-Ming Pang
title: Jo sok
